ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: `:` delimited list of hostnames to listen on

TIME_ZONE.description: you'll also want to set `TZ` if deploying to Heroku

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_LOGO.description: a logo to display in the nav

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_PUBLIC.description: if true, the checkin summary page visible with out logging in

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_REMINDER_HOUR.description: hour of the day to send reminders, default: 9

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_REMINDER_MINUTE.description: minute of the hour to send reminders, default: 0

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_REMINDER_DAYS.description: days of the week to send reminders, default: mon,tue,wed,thu,fri

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_REMINDER_TASK.description: celery task to user for to send reminders with

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_REPORT_HOUR.description: hour of the day to send reports, default: 12

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_REPORT_MINUTE.description: minute of the hour to send reports, default: 0

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_REPORT_DAYS.description: days of the week to send reports, default: mon,tue,wed,thu,fri

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_REPORT_TASK.description: celery task to user for to send reminders with

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_SLACK_WEBHOOK.description: slack webhook to use when using slack for reminders and reports

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_REPORT_SLACK_CHANNEL.description: slack channel to use when using slack for reports, default: `#general`

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_CHECKIN_TASK.description: celery task to user for to send checkins with

OPEN_TEAM_STATUS_CHECKIN_SLACK_CHANNEL.description: slack channel to use when using slack for delivering checkins, default: `#general`
